content.title: <TextStyle.Red>üëã Welcome to ASGames Primal Chaos!</>
content.text:
Welcome to ASGames Primal Chaos!  
 
Please make a tribe.

Daily Restarts: 5:00 AM CST

This server is a WIP ‚Äî settings and mods are subject to change. 

We use auto decay: if your tribe is offline for more than 7 days your dinos and structures will be auto-wiped. To check decay time on any structure or dino, target them and type /decaytime for the remaining time. 

Structures with less than 10 items will decay in 2 days (usually taming pens).  

Any item that matches its recipe is disabled. 

Do NOT use names like 123 or Human. Do NOT use profanity or derogatory names ‚Äî they will be renamed.

This is a US server. Please only speak English in General Chat.

content.title: <TextStyle.Red>Notes</>
content.text:
Hold down the menu button to select the EC Guide for more information.

Structures take damage ‚Äî build with that in mind. Avoid thatch houses!

content.title: <TextStyle.Blue>Rules</>
content.text:
By playing on this server, you consent to the rules below:

- Do not use profanity in general chat (a filter is in place).

- Any items or exploits that bypass mod progression will be removed immediately; repeat offenses may result in a ban.

- Do not use derogatory, offensive, or vulgar names. Your character will be renamed.

- No excessive placement of structures, pillars, or foundations (no structure spamming).

- No building or blocking of caves or resource areas that include artifacts, loot crates, or more than 6 resource nodes.

- No blocking obelisks.

- No hacking or exploiting game bugs.

- No kiting or dropping dinos into bases to destroy property ‚Äî this results in an immediate ban.

- No blocking resource spawns or placing random small bases near them.

- No harassment building near enemy bases.

- No 'holding' base spots with temporary structures. Random buildings = full tribe wipe. Manage new tribe members carefully.

content.title: <TextStyle.Blue>Rules Cont</>
content.text:
- Do not leave taming pens unattended ‚Äî counts as a second structure. ALL tribe structures will be wiped.

- One base per tribe (max 50x50, 20 walls high).

- Do NOT leave dinos out ‚Äî use soulballs. Max 10 dinos out at a time (exceptions: gachas or active breeding).

- Zero tolerance for racism or bullying.

- Do not give high-tier items, tames, or eggs to lower-level players who have not progressed naturally.

- Abusing any mechanic or exploit = ban.

- Wild teleporters MUST be public. Non-compliance = limited to 1 per tribe.

- Do not leech boss fights or AoE loot without invitation.

- Do not kill wyverns or egg dinos for new players to take eggs ‚Äî they must earn them.

- No breeding of genderless mod dinos (too OP/unbalanced).

content.title: <TextStyle.Green>Information</>
content.text:
For Consoles Discord link: https://discord.gg/eJsHn4mPRg

Donations/Shop: https://chronsasastore.tebex.io/

PC: Press F3 for the shop menu.

You earn 50 points every 30 minutes of playtime.

Earn more points by donating ‚Äî use the 'Purchase Points' button for link.

If you experience FPS issues, try these console commands:

r.VolumetricCloud 0
r.Fog 0
grass.enable 0
r.Streaming.PoolSize 0
r.Lumen.ScreenProbeGather.RadianceCache.ProbeResolution 16
r.DynamicGlobalIlluminationMethod 2
r.ShadowQuality 0

content.title: <TextStyle.Green>Donations</>
content.text:
You can support the server by purchasing points.

Click the 'Purchase Points' tab ‚Äî it leads to our Tebex store.

In the store, select ARK SHOP ASCENDED and log in with your Steam account.

If purchasing a package or subscription, include your Discord name for role setup and ensure your Discord is linked.

After purchase, redeem points in-game with /redeem <tbx-id>.

Points are delivered instantly to your player.

content.title: <TextStyle.Green>Settings</>
content.text:
Settings are subject to change.

Max Dino Level: 150

Player Levels: 130 (135 with Chibi)

Harvest: 3x

Taming: 3x

Mating Interval: 1x (default)

Egg Hatch Speed: 3x

Crop Growth: 50x

Custom Drops enabled.

content.title: <TextStyle.Yellow>Gameplay & Progression</>
content.content:
<TextStyle.White>Gliders help reduce fall damage.

The Upgrade Station allows upgrades only up to <TextStyle.Cyan>Journeyman</>. For higher-tier blueprints, search loot drops or bosses.

The Blueprint Station is disabled.

Kill <TextStyle.Red>Shinies</> to unlock Tek progression.

Most Tek Engrams unlock automatically at <TextStyle.Green>Level 120</>.

Progress through drops and exploration ‚Äî this server encourages organic advancement, not instant crafting.</>

<TextStyle.Yellow>Drop & Gear Tips</>

<TextStyle.White>‚û§ White/Green Drops: Starter gear and basic blueprints.
‚û§ Blue/Purple Drops: Journeyman gear and rare items.
‚û§ Yellow/Red Drops: Advanced or Tek-related blueprints.
‚û§ Bosses: Key source for Tek unlocks and late-game loot.

High-tier crafting and progression are balanced to keep gameplay challenging but rewarding.</>

content.title: <TextStyle.Yellow>Drop & Gear Tips</>
content.text:
üí† White/Green Drops: Starter gear and basic blueprints.
üíé Blue/Purple Drops: Journeyman gear and rare items.
üî∂ Yellow/Red Drops: Advanced or Tek-related blueprints.
üèÜ Bosses: Key source for Tek unlocks and late-game loot.

High-tier crafting and progression are balanced to keep gameplay challenging but rewarding.

content.title: <TextStyle.Green>Shop Overview</>
content.text:
Use F3 (PC) or the Shop option in the UI to view items available for purchase.

Earn points by playing (50 per 30 minutes) or purchasing through our Tebex store.
